column5: Guys I have a checkered aluminum skid plate (flat plate to improve hole shot and keep water out of the JP) under my JP that has developed 2 cracks and need it welded,anyone in Durham region area able to weld this?
Arc Angel Welding Services10 Shoreview Court, Bowmanville L1C 3V2, ON  p: 905-439-9353  A J Manufacturing  320 Marwood Drive,  Oshawa, ON L1H 8B4  From Google
Is there no one that will swap it out,til repaired Hirk? Got to be a bass boat shop willing to do that for you. Brotherhood and all.

Thx HTHM,I'll try them Brian I can run it as is no problem,just don't want it cracking too much more and ending up in pieces.It's custom made,no swaping it out,I could just take it off but it serves a purpose so would rather weld it.
There are lots of tractor/trailer repair shops around along the 401 corridor.They do alot of alum welding as well.
Myself would replace it.It crack once do to stress. Welding it would make it weaker.
if you do get it welded, the next time it cracks it will be alot worst.
